title: 2025 Oscars Red Carpet Photos: Halle Berry, Miley Cyrus, Selena Gomez
description: Ariana Grande, Timothée Chalamet and Selena Gomez arrived in season-defining style.
author: The Styles Desk
excerpt: Ariana Grande, Timothée Chalamet and Selena Gomez arrived in season-defining style.
text: Demi Moore in a Giorgio Armani Privé gown.Credit...Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesOscars Red Carpet 2025: All the Stars, All the LooksAriana Grande, Timothée Chalamet and Selena Gomez arrived in season-defining style.Demi Moore in a Giorgio Armani Privé gown.Credit...Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesMarch 2, 2025Updated 8:04 p.m. ETThe carpet outside the Dolby Theater in Los Angeles was classic red. The stars who appeared at the 97th Academy Awards wore colors from all across the spectrum.The Oscars campaign season has been a long but fashionable slog for Timothée Chalamet, Colman Domingo, Cynthia Erivo, Ariane Grande, Mikey Madison and other luminaries. By the time they arrived for the annual ceremony on Sunday afternoon, they had settled into their sartorial best.Here’s how the nominees, presenters and performers looked when they made their biggest entrances of the year.ImageTimothée Chalamet in a Givenchy suit. He was nominated in the best actor category for “A Complete Unknown.”Credit...Nina Westervelt for The New York TimesSwipe for more →Colman DomingoJutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesJutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesMike Coppola/Getty ImagesMike Coppola/Getty ImagesMike Coppola/Getty ImagesImageMikey Madison, who was nominated for best actress for “Anora,” wore a Dior gown.Credit...Nina Westervelt for The New York TimesImageZoe Saldana, nominated for best actress for “Emilia Pérez,” wore a gown by Yves Saint Laurent.Credit...Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesImageSelena Gomez, an “Emilia Pérez” cast member who was one of the presenters at the ceremony, wore Ralph Lauren.Credit...Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesSwipe for more →Cynthia ErivoJutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York TimesJae C. html:
Oscars Red Carpet 2025: All the Stars, All the Looks

Ariana Grande, Timothée Chalamet and Selena Gomez arrived in season-defining style.

Demi Moore in a Giorgio Armani Privé gown.Credit...Jutharat Pinyodoonyachet for The New York Times

  • March 2, 2025Updated 8:04 p.m. ET

The carpet outside the Dolby Theater in Los Angeles was classic red. The stars who appeared at the 97th Academy Awards wore colors from all across the spectrum.

The Oscars campaign season has been a long but fashionable slog for Timothée Chalamet, Colman Domingo, Cynthia Erivo, Ariane Grande, Mikey Madison and other luminaries. By the time they arrived for the annual ceremony on Sunday afternoon, they had settled into their sartorial best.

Here’s how the nominees, presenters and performers looked when they made their biggest entrances of the year.
